student.name: Alex Johnson
student.bio: GSoC 2024 @ OWASP | Open Source Enthusiast | Full-Stack Developer

project.title: Enhanced Security Testing Dashboard for BLT
project.description: Developing a comprehensive security testing dashboard that integrates vulnerability scanning, penetration testing results, and automated security reports. The project aims to make security testing more accessible and actionable for developers.

mentor.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
mentor.role: OWASP BLT Lead Maintainer & GSoC Mentor
